program codeforces567a

  implicit none

  integer :: n, i, max_val, min_val

  integer, allocatable :: ar(:)

  read(*,*) n

  allocate(ar(n))

  read(*,*) (ar(i), i=1, n)

  do i = 1, n

    max_val = max(ar(i) - ar(1), ar(n) - ar(i))

    if (i == 1) then
        min_val = ar(i + 1) - ar(i)
    else if (i == n) then
        min_val = ar(i) - ar(i - 1)
    else
        min_val = min(ar(i) - ar(i - 1), ar(i + 1) - ar(i))
    end if

    print *, min_val, max_val

  end do

  deallocate(ar)

end program codeforces567a
